name: No Version Tags
author: George Gkouvousis

sections.description:
Simple, yet effective plugin that once activated, it will eliminate every CSS version tag of WordPress plugins, core & themes.

Bonus: your website will receive a small boost of SEO, you will experience no CSS caching issues anymore and hackers wont be able to recognize your version numbers.

Try its demo here
sections.installation:
All you have to do, is to upload our plugin within your WordPress Plugins menu and activate it (in case of manual install).

Ta daa, magic happens ðŸ™‚ All versions are removed from the source code.

In case you face any issues, feel free to raise a support ticket here
sections.faq:
Is it complatible with every WordPress version?

Yes it is!

short_description: Description: Upon activation, this plugin will automatically eliminate the annoying '?ver=x.x' signs from your perfect code :)
